title: Ep. 738 All of a Sudden, the Liberal Media Cares About Surveillance
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the indictment of a U.S. Senate staff member for leaks and the hypocritical response of the liberal media. I also address the ruthless attacks on Sean Hannity by liberal goons along with more liberal economic nonsense. 
 
News Picks:
The indictments start to rain down in the DOJ leaks probe. 
 
Why are Google, Facebook, and Amazon partnering with a hate group to police their Internet presence?
 
The Eagles embarrassed themselves with their White House stunt. 
 
Another disgusting attack on Sean Hannity. 
 
Ten paradoxes of our time. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
 
 
 
 
 
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
